name: PuppyDog.clock (DEMO)
description:
Based off of Sonic.exe + a story I wrote here: https://www.wattpad.com/1170914211-niceypasta-nice%27s-cliche-creepypastas-puppydog

WARNING: May be creepy to some.

Special thanks to Zeebeethedog for the character Puppy Dog.

"An addon for the popular game 'Puppy Dog: Space Time Adventure,'  but for free! Speedrun through this fun game as you collect coins, battle enemies, and make friends as you try to find your way home!

TIMER ADDITIONS:

  • Start with twice the amount of health as you would.
  • Start with a autogenerated amount of coins. (will not change unless you wipe all memory of the game)
  • And more!"

CREDITS:

NiceSuperdash for creating the game + story.

Zeebeethedog for the character Puppy Dog.

Gilgar35 for original "Alone" platformer.
